duties.title: Know Your Facilities
duties.content:
Know Your Facilities

Your High Impact facilities are:

  • Energy Control Center/DOMS EMS Room – Deer Valley
  • Backup Control Center/502 Data Center – 502 Building

Your Medium Impact facilities are:

  • Four Corners Power Plant
  • Substations
    • Cedar Mountain 500
    • Cholla 500
    • Cholla 345
    • Dugas 500
    • Four Corners 500
    • Four Corners 345
    • Four Corners 230
    • Hoodoo Wash 500
    • Moenkopi 500
    • Morgan 500
    • Navajo 500
    • North Gila 500
    • Ocotillo 230
    • Pinnacle Peak 500
    • Pinnacle Peak 345
    • Pinnacle Peak 230

If you work at or support one of these facilities, you have duties to defend CIP-Related Cyber Assets and BCSI.

POTENTIAL ISSUES

Not knowing the classification of the facilities you support.

duties.title: Review Inventory Annually
duties.content:
Review Asset List Annually

A Regulatory Advisor or Consultant will annually check that the CRCA inventory is correct and may request your review and approval when this duty is required.

POTENTIAL ISSUES

  • Not performing review in time required
  • Approving inaccurate asset list information
